website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that works as an end table or snack table.
pros: This lightweight table can tuck under a couch for easy reach
18 inches wide by 10 inches deep by 25 inches high
cons: Particleboard laminated top is not the best quality

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much we bought another!
customer_reviews.text: Cute table, perfect for drinks or an iPad. I love the simple minimalistic look. Some said the wood looked fake, it is fake wood. But the look is very "in"! Like laminate floors shown on HGTV.Very nice quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cinderkelly

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived intact and was simple to assemble. It is exactly what I wanted. Bad: the plastic fake wood cover arrived curled on one whole side. The picture shows this. This is not fixable and I'm not sure if I want to bother to return it or not. Deduct two stars for poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: M. Booth

customer_reviews.title: but easy to put together and the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Plastic covered particle board, but easy to put together and the price is right. Seems durable. Within 24 hours, one of the rubber floor protectors fell off. That not surprising because they were just stick on like stickers. That’s ok because I put felt protectors on and it slides nicer on my wood floor. Not the highest quality, but it’s inexpensive and durable for the busy family with kids. Love it as a table to use with my sectional couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Perfect Fit between reclining chairs in my living room
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 recliners in my living room that due to space restrictions have to be placed fairly close to each other. This item is PERFECT - it is narrow enough to fit between the recliners and is also the PERFECT HEIGHT (I don't remember the exact dimentions but the top of the table is almost exactly at the same height as the arm rests (perfect beer grabbing dimentions!). Just want to give a shout out for this product - simple design, easy to assemble and made of good material.
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: As cheap and unstable as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: With limited space in my office I needed a small table for a scanner that is connected to my computer. This table was a perfect fit for it's dimensions and will suffice for my use but note that it is as cheap and unstable as it looks. It also reeked of a strong chemical smell that I've encountered before with furniture manufactured in China. Will need to leave it in the garage for a week or so for it to off-gas before placing in my house. A bit annoying considering the shipping took two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, will work fine for us
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived on time, was packaged very well. All parts were included (with tools and a couple of extra screws). Instructions were clear, and the table assembly was simple. Overall, very satisfied, and would buy another if we needed one. If the laminate ever pulled apart, I would just replace it with a solid piece of stained hardwood with polyurethane.
customer_reviews.author: G. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: it is so comfortable, everytime we watch movies and put our glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying our side table!! it is so comfortable, everytime we watch movies and put our glasses of wine or popcorn on it! it is really functional and stylish! By the way, I was worried about the bad reviews on the rubber protectors, but I used one drop of super glue on them and they work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting much but this was a great lil table! Took 10-15 min to assemble. Super easy. The best part is the top. It's sturdy and even feels like wood on top. You can feel the grains. Nice dark gray color. For the price it is great. Holds my old laptop (super wide? Just fine and a teeny space for a drink. Whew. If you had a slim laptop or iPad even better! This was a good buy 👍🏼 UPDATE October 2017 I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: TexasT

customer_reviews.title: Modern, stylish, but low end materials with a price to match-but I do adore them!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two on wedding registry and received as a gift. We loved tgem so much that we biught two more for use as night stands. The top of the table is basically MDF covered in wood look contact paper (meaning a coaster is required). Overall, I adore the look and my husband loves having "tv trays" that are modern and light weight. We did buy again and recommend for individuals that can be disciplined with the using of the Rogaine--I mean coaster. Seriously though, these trays will not hold up in a frat house nor will they well endure toddlers (they're not solid anything but they offer high end style on a budget).
customer_reviews.author: Billup Elif

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned and have been using this table for about a year and a half - we LOVE it. My husband and I debated between getting this and a more traditional end table but this won out and it’s a winner. We have limited space and really appreciate having the flexibility to move this around. Though the top is plastic (actually ideal so we don’t need to worry about using a coaster), it appears to be an attractive coastal/weathered wood and looks more high-end than it really is. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: VA Belle

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Does the trick, Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are a great buy. I would recommend them for a dorm or as first furniture, etc. I’m using them in my boys loft where all of their friends gather to play video games. They needed a cheap sturdy set of side tables that didn’t make me cringe to look at and these fit the bill. They were also super simple and quick to put together. My 7 year old could’ve done it.
customer_reviews.author: Holden & Greys Mama

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: While I am keeping this table because it is the right height and size and because I have already assembled it, for the price it is not worth it as it is made of hollow cheap metal and plastic, very light, and not at all sturdy. I am very disappointed with what I received for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: GMAC

customer_reviews.title: Great side table or for between the cushions
customer_reviews.text: This little table is awesome. It matches much of our distressed wood furniture and doesn't look out of place. I use this table every day beside the couch. My only complaint is that the stick-on vinyl feet keep coming off. I had to go to a hardware store and buy replacements, but every time this moves on my hardwood floor, the feet seem to shift. This would be perfect is the feet were permanently mounted. But for the price, totally worth getting. Even though it's not real wood, it looks convincing enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlit Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute - we use all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Since having a baby, these have been VERY handy in our living room! They are very beautiful and can be moved around easily. Only complaint/suggestion is to not move them across the floor with stuff on top of the tabletop. It'll for sure fall/spill. They're kinda light weight, so another risk is the dog knocking them over. But if you're stationary, they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jenee PS

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted...perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect compliment to my home office right next to my recliner. The remote I had for my TV used to get lost in the recliner so this is the perfect compliment to my home office to keep it from getting lost and to put a drink or a sandwich on.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: The height is right for our sectional, and from far away it's a nice looking little table. It's pretty cheap and will knock over easily, so owner beware. Do yourself a favor and don't even bother putting those clear feet on the bottom, you'll just find them on a dog paw or on your sock in ten minutes - get some 3M rubber feet and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: looks and reviews deceive
customer_reviews.text: One of the rare times we were disappointed in an Amazon purchase. The table is flimsy and cheap. Both in looks and construction. We are returning it before we knock it over. Would not recommend. Spend a few more bucks and get something more substantial and of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: F. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, needed a narrow table to keep my pc off thd ground since I don't have much space and I love the quality of this one. Yea it's not mdf or real wood but it looks great, perfect for using as a nightstand or even a side table. If you don't have much room yet need a table you can use this and store small boxes underneath.
customer_reviews.author: jose martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cute little table.
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that could be moved around our sectional easily and this little table works perfectly. It's not top-of-the-line but it serves our needs just fine. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: angel87cat

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much. I bought it a while back and it was even cheaper at the time (like $30 or so I want to say?). It's not made with fancy materials and the "wood look" looks like wood from far away but is essentially plastic and looks it up close. However, I love that it's waterproof and durable and I can use it to play games for a while on my laptop while on the couch or to set food or drinks down on and it's lightweight and small enough to move it around all the time. Way cheaper than a lot of other similar options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I have had a table similar to this for many years that needed to be replaced. For the price this worked great. It is a bit on the bigger side but fits nicely over the sofa and coffee table and sideways between 2 ottomans. It was super easy to put together, it came with all the tools and took about 15 mins. So far it's been sturdy and nothing has peeled or warped.
customer_reviews.author: Suri B.

customer_reviews.title: Love mine!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! Very easy to put together and super sturdy! Perfect size, not too big but still fits the things I need. We have a big sectional couch and if you are in the middle you have nowhere to put drinks. This slides right under and gives you a space to put your stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: DZom

customer_reviews.title: Great little end tables!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our living room. They were easy to assemble, and they're good looking little tables. Don't expect these to be incredibly sturdy, they're not. But if you need something to hold your coffee, phone, remotes, then these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: KPAlias

customer_reviews.title: Pefect size
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a skinny side table for a while, it's perfectly sized for what i needed, enough surface space for so many things. I usually keep my sleep mask, water bottle, phone and ipad next to me on this table. It's even held my lenovo laptop. sturdy and flat/straight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Cute little table and would've given 5 stars had all the hardware been included. Missing 2 screws and had 4 suction cups that didn't belong to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and works perfectly for use in our theater.Wood is pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in my theater and it looks great. Positives: -Easy to put together -Reclaimed Wood finish is pretty -Fits under sofa for floating table above couch -Value price -Looks good -Solidly Built. No wobble. Negatives: -Let’s are skinny and look a bit flimsy. Overall, this has become a staple of our house and is a great value and item.
customer_reviews.author: RWTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent.
customer_reviews.text: The top is clearly not wood but I’ll tell you what, from a distance you’d never know so O find these are working better as small mall stands next to our fireplace than side tables. We have super short couches and they still wouldn’t fit over the armrest. I do still like them and may buy them as nightstands for guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2nd home in Chicago which is a small studio apartment. I just needed a small side table beside my king bed to put drinks etc on. This was easy to put together and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not high enough.
customer_reviews.text: I like the reclaimed wood and enjoy the look of this side table. However, it does not slide under the couch and fit over the end of the couch or my single chair. I use it anyway and prefer this to other ones. I wish it was a little taller and that is why I didn't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shandee

customer_reviews.title: Size & Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Tables are a little smaller than what I really wanted, easy to move because they are very light weight. But, also dont feel as sturdy because of the light weight. Top is definitely gray.
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT look like the pictures VERY UGLY
customer_reviews.text: It’s not gold it’s weird mustard colour. And the screws on the bottom Facing up so you can see them are silver. Whoever designed this had no idea of design. Just cheap and ugly looking. Unfortunately we have to keep It. We can’t return it in the midst of deadliest virus in the century because everything is locked down. Just don’t buy it, maybe the wooden version is better, but I highly doubt that.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie27

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I wanted for the space. However, the top was delivered damaged. I didn’t notice it until after I assembled, so I’m not sure that I can even return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: FictionFountain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy feel to it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Sturdy. Too short to fit over the armrest of our gigantic couch but that's my fault because I didnt measure ahead. Still works well pulled up to the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Average for the price
customer_reviews.text: I know it's not an expensive piece, but it's cheaply made. After putting together it has a small movement. You can twist it out, but it could be better. Other than that my son likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Premel

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Look for something better
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed. I thought it would be a little taller, I can barely put my legs under it and it's only like 4-5 inches taller than my coffee table. To set up, you have to make the holes yourself on the table while you put in the screw which could make the table crooked if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks like pictured. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like pictured. Like the textured top that imitates wood. I use as a side table in a skinny spot for my drinks. Not really big enough for a laptop, but maybe a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: DaFam

customer_reviews.title: even after tightening the screws like 500 times
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable, even after tightening the screws like 500 times. Did not fit where I wanted it, so it's kind of in the way, but we use it. MEASURE carefully if you buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Sturdy Little Side-Table
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy little table is a wonderful find. It's functional, stable and fits perfectly in the spot I needed it, while looking quite chic. I didn't expect the quality to be so nice at this price point, but it pleasantly surprised me. I use it every day! Would recommend to anyone looking to purchase light weight, easily movable side-table.
customer_reviews.author: J Porter

customer_reviews.title: Cute industrial modern table
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other tables I found, this was a great value! Small, lightweight, easy to assemble. Perfect for my husband next to his recliner. The rustic wood on top has a nice contrast to our dark walnut floors. The black steel also match our stools at the nearby kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: stmi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use near/on my large sectional sofa. I have an ottoman so that isn't the most stable thing to keep drinks and things on. This is awesome because it slides under my couch so it can sit next to me. It is tall enough that it isn't at the couch level but rather at a table level. You do have to build yourself, the instructions are a little confusing (more pictures than words) but we figured it out and are very happy with this! It looks great in our front room.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great table with many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, probably took a total of 10 minutes. I like the versatility of this table. I can stick it on the end of sectional like a traditional end table or use over the ottoman or sectional to eat on. I’m buying another one. Great for my family!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good price - maybe best thing I bought all year.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Would definitely order again. Fits in my living room well. Matches decor. Looks great. So easy to put together and just a good table for the money. Use it everyday. I like the depth of the table top!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Handy!
customer_reviews.text: A snap to put together and they're really cute. A little shorter than I wanted...I was hoping to use as a reading table in bed...that's on me though...I should have measured first. I like them though and will keep for use in living room.
customer_reviews.author: D. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but extremely top heavy.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, looks nice. My problem with it is that the bottom is SO LIGHT, even the slightest bump and stuff falls off of it. Extremely top heavy table, which doesn't make for a very good table. Serves its purpose well enough but really wish the bottom was weighted.
customer_reviews.author: melanie horton

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This looked good at first and held together for 3 mo then it fell apart! I guess you get what you pay for. Not a bargain if it doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.author: STMD

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is a faux wood and metal table as described. I took it to work and had my carpenter use the wood top as a template to make a real oak top. He transferred the cams and voila! Fantastic! The metalwork is aluminum. It screws together and makes for a sturdy table. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Laventure

customer_reviews.title: Very very very cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This entire product probably cost eight dollars to make. You’d be better off paying a little extra and buying elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Caticus.Jack

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl image for faux distressed wood
customer_reviews.text: The description says it is a hardwood top with a reclaimed look finish. I expected it to be wood artificially distressed to look reclaimed instead is is a vinyl image of reclaimed wood wrapped around the hardwood top. Returning without even assembling. So diso
customer_reviews.author: WorkingForKicks

customer_reviews.title: No hardware!
customer_reviews.text: None of the hardware was in the box. Looked as if the box had been opened and the hardware was removed. The instructions were all ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little piece!
customer_reviews.text: I like this little table. It matched everything else in our living room set to a T. It's not an expensive purchase but against other more expensive pieces, it blends in. We had a very narrow space between a wall with blinds and our couch that needed a narrow end table. I could totally see this as being used for a laptop table or even eating at the couch. I wish I had found it sooner for one of those purposes. We were very surprised and impressed. It's sturdy and the wood top is convincing as real wood. The construction was very easy too. Took 5 minutes and I did it alone with only the pieces provided. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy, fake wood looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Fairly sturdy. The “unnatural“ wood look that others have complained about is not as bad as it sounds. Actually, it’s nice that I don’t have to worry about using a coaster on this product because it is not damageable by water. It’s not as “plasticky“ as others have described. I think it looks great. Has stood up to my kids leaning on it quite a few times.
customer_reviews.author: soltvedt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bed with drawers
customer_reviews.text: We have a bed with drawers and needed nightstands where we were still able to open the drawers closest to the headboard. These trays are perfect. They are simple to put together, small enough to work for a bed with drawers, yet the tray is large enough to use as a nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on price and relatively decent reviews. Overall disappointed in the product quality, cheap and wobbly and the "wood" looks and feels incredibly fake. I tried tightening the base and it just stripped, and still wobbles. It didn't take long for this to end up in the basement, eventually to make it's way to a garage sale. I found a better quality one, and cheaper at TJ's.
customer_reviews.author: AOI

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot. Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice, but it doesn't work well. The table is not sturdy. I wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great couch table
customer_reviews.text: Great couch table. Daughter had one of these. Liked it so much we got one too. Very easy to put together and works great. Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID A GOLDEN

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Macbook!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these for a couch. The wood looks nice and assembly was easy. Easily supports my macbook and typing. Pros: - Great wood finish - Easy assembly Cons: - Worried about long term relaiability
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - does go with Altra Emmett
customer_reviews.text: This does match the Altra Emmett line - not sure why it has a different name, but i also bought the 42" tv coffee stand in the same color and they match perfectly! Great product for the price. It's a lot sturdier than I thought it would be for the price, I have 3 dogs that knock everything over, but this withstands a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Yinzer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Table looks exactly like the picture. Looks great in my livingroom. Only gave 4 stars because i keep having to replace the clear gel tab on the bottom. No matter where i put them, they keep falling off. Once this pack is gone, I'll switch to felt. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: The top is plastic like but you can't really tell this unless you examine ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these as nightstands for a space that traditionally couldn't have fit two. They took about 10-15 mins each to put together and they honestly look more expensive than they are. The top is plastic like but you can't really tell this unless you examine it closer. Personally I love the look of them and to everyone that is saying they are flimsy, I have to disagree.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this 4 stars because the top is very clearly a wood “look.” Other than that, the table has held up perfectly and is very mobile. It’s not the widest, so if you intend to use it for a laptop desk you won’t be able to use your mouse with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Cute If a Little Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is perfect as a small bedside table. It is a little flimsy--the metals could be oh so much larger and heavier for better scale but I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: dbx820

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for a nice table
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect for the price, but the style and size were what I was looking for so I took a chance. Wow! This little table looks great and far more expensive than it is, and is really solid. Easy assembly if you can work an Allen wrench, which is included.
customer_reviews.author: SecretSanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice size - assembly a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for a small space. Assembly instructions were only in pictures and left a bit to be desired. The little rubber floor protectors are adhesive and come off pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This table is very flimsy and not sturdy at all. It was very easy to put together though. The price is too high for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great table! But..
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was the extra bar , which prevents the table from being closer when sitting on the couch
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It had a few screws missing and some dents on the frame but it is a nice side table
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $7 because it had been damaged and returned.. It had a few screws missing and some dents on the frame but it is a nice side table. Super easy to move around and big enough for remotes, kindle, cell phone AND my coffee :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaeley

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my wife and I were looking for. It fits perfectly next to our couch. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis, J

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve little table for a couch with lower arm rests! Very sturdy and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. I bought two to put around my couch, and they're very easy to assemble alone. They matched the dimensions given, but I wish they had been a little longer. Overall good tables!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Coury

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.... does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok.... does the trick for what I need for something around the couch. Easy to put together.... took 5minutes. Definitely not worth the 45$, should be more like 25$
customer_reviews.author: J. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price, easy to put together. The "wood look finish" is pretty good and slightly textured to better mimic wood. You can only really see the laminate if you look closely at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It could be a little sturdier but it looks great especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: BSotts

customer_reviews.title: Great little side table.
customer_reviews.text: Great little side table. Looks modern, fair price. Only thing is it is really light, but my 15 pound cat still hasn't knocked it over?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Handy and sylish!  This is the 3rd one we bought!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I have bought for our Ski Condo. Great price and good quality. Stylish. We use it to put our humidifiers on them and they work perfectly! We had to assemble it but it didn't take but a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MiCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Easy to assemble and I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: ejc2184

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad he loves it and uses it everyday! Easy to put together looks very nice. First one we bought was very small this one would fit any couch
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn D

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: The top is not real wood. Better priced products at Ikea. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: B. Bove

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: This assembled easily and suits my purposes very well. I like the weathered gray finish because it blends well with the rest of my décor.
customer_reviews.author: Suetois

customer_reviews.title: It slides right under the couch and it's great for remotes
customer_reviews.text: This little table arrived in a flat box. It took about five minutes to put together. It has been the most versatile little table and I want another one. It slides right under the couch and it's great for remotes, beverages, and laptops.it is been in use for over a month and has been durable and wipes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Margot B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Rickety, lightweight and low quality materials. Fell apart in 1 year. Maybe worth $25
customer_reviews.author: StankyLeg

customer_reviews.title: yes
customer_reviews.text: the recipient like the gift. I don't like being solicited for my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: d1b2

customer_reviews.title: Affordable C table
customer_reviews.text: Great small tables and easy to setup. The construction is for sure on the cheap side, don't tighten the screws too far or they will bend the metal and go through the openings. The faux wood looks nice and doesn't feel too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Cote

customer_reviews.title: and the top looks pretty fake/cheap. But for the price it's not bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is a breeze. You kind of get what you pay for here though. The table is very lightweight, and the top looks pretty fake/cheap. But for the price it's not bad as long as you dont have a dog or kids that are likely to knock it over too much.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and great price. Assembly took all of five minutes and you don’t need any tools. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these as side tables for our front living area. My husband needed something moveable to eat on while he watches the news and drinks coffee in the morning. They are super easy to put together and have held up well for the last 4-5 months we've had them. They serve their purpose well and look nice while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Reddell

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Wish it came in deeper on the sofa and it's not tall enough to go over the sofa arm, but I still like it and fund it to been very handy, especially working from home and wanting a break from the desk.
customer_reviews.author: sskeels15

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if all the parts come...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this package, it was busted. Inside this large busted box were the frame pieces to this table...and nothing else. No hardware, no instructions, no packing information, no "sorry about your luck". But lucky for me, my husband is handy and put the table together with hardware we purchased. The table is sturdy. It is also functional. Other than the horrible shipping conditions it came in, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something easy to move that still looked nice. This table is perfect. Fits perfectly when using it on my couch, and was super easy to put together. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mands

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, easy to put together and sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, easy to put together and sharp looking. Holds my laptop and mouse and there's still space. Then looks like a side table.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great little table for coffee cup
customer_reviews.text: We have a large sectional with a large matching cloth ottoman, and no where to put a drink. Bought one of these to try it and we are all fighting over it! Buying another. Great little table for coffee cup, plate, laptop etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Ogilvie

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was very nice, rounded corners and a grayish color laminate of reclaimed wood.... then the second one I bought came in and even the metal was different. The wood laminate was more yellow and light colored and sides were not rounded, they were squared off sharply. Disappointed in this companies consistency in manufacturing...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Salko

customer_reviews.title: A great little table
customer_reviews.text: This little table is really nice looking in person. it's a nice size for holding the tv remote, your phone, and a snack. It tucks nicely under the edge of the sofa, and glides easily on the floor when you need to move it. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RaeAnne C. Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice side table
customer_reviews.text: Looks great next to my oversized chair. The wood has a grayish washed look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kruszynski

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tables!! I’ve had them almost a year!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Neesley

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Easy assembly! Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The price is great, and it took me 15 minutes to assemble just one table. Super cheap, and it does the job just fine. Mine came to me in excellent condition. The box had a little tear but probably due to how it was handled by the mail people. I would absolutely recommend this product if you want a cute end table at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table as I can move it wherever I am sitting to put my drink or laptop. It goes under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Harpreet Nagra

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy feeling, but good value for price. Bought at last minute for more additional table top for Christmas party drinks and it arrived promptly. Went together quickly, although brief directions would have made it go together even faster (and properly?). Have no idea what the use for the little glass 'bubbles' included is. It will be easy to take apart and put away for later use.
customer_reviews.author: foster

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look and super easy to put together! One was a little wobbly (I ordered two for my living room), but the little rubber feet they include did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and look very nice
customer_reviews.text: We use these instead of traditional end tables. One is on the side of the couch and one fits over the other side. We do not use coaster and have not had any problems. Sturdy and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gieger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little side table!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little side table. I'm really happy with this simple side table. I use it to hold my remotes and drink and love the fact that the low profile base slides under the couch so it takes up minimal floor space!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Matchett

product_meta.title: SoSo-BanTian1989 Reclaimed Wood Look Finish Snack Side End Table (Black)
feature_bullets: Features a reclaimed wood look top
Can be used as end tables, lamp tables, decorative displays tables, or simply accent pieces
Dimensions: 24 inches high x 18 inches wide x 10 inches deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars612 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
